synopsis.text: With the emergence of enigmatic creatures wreaking havoc in the present day, a scientist named Sousuke Banba embarks on a mission to unveil the truth behind these mysterious attacks. As these beasts prey on unsuspecting humans, from students fighting for survival in their school to a video blogger's crew falling victim to a real monster, Banba's only clue is the keyword 'Kagewani,' meaning 'Shadow Crocodile.' In a desperate race against time, Banba scours the recent attack sites, hoping to find a way to eradicate these threats. However, his investigation takes a darker turn when a pharmaceutical company, Sarugaku, starts meddling in his affairs. Brace yourself for a chilling suspense as this gripping tale unfolds, where humanity stands on the brink of an unimaginable threat.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
